Html:
I tried to create a WinForm project and use the MySQL and FluentData. Results showed that cannot connect to MySQL, run-time prompts: "the request could not be found. Net Framework Data Provider, and may not be installed. ‚Äù

1) I downloaded and installed the Oracle website MySQL Connector Net and MySQL Connector ODBC, MySQL.Data.dll was also referenced in the project.

2) MySQL.Data.dll referenced in my WinForm project and effectively through ADO.NET to access MySQL, but FluentData is not accessible.

Can provide simple examples for FluentData access to MySQL, including how to configure MySQL development environment using FluentData.

Thank you so much.
